snippet.title: Mini Militia - Doodle Army 2 Trailer
snippet.description:
►SUBSCRIBE for more: http://mcgam.es/miniclipsubscribe

ABOUT MINICLIP 
Miniclip is home to over 1000 great free games online and on iPhone, iPad, Android and Windows Phone. Our YouTube channel brings you the best trailers, walkthroughs, tips and tricks, gameplay footage and fan-made videos from all things Miniclip, with new videos added every week. 

We publish the best videos on our hit games, including 8 Ball Pool, Ultimate Golf, Mini Football, Carrom and plenty more. Subscribe to our channel http://mcgam.es/miniclipsubscribe or play games on Miniclip now: http://mcgam.es/PlayMiniclip 

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Miniclip
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Miniclip
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/miniclip
Linkedin: https://linkedin.com/company/miniclip
FAQ and Support: https://mcgam.es/1mfIMh8
